      • create

        @PostMapping("/create")
public Product create​(@RequestParam
                      int accountId,
                      @RequestParam
                      java.lang.String name,
                      @RequestParam
                      int weight,
                      @RequestParam
                      boolean conditionUsed,
                      @RequestParam
                      double price,
                      @RequestParam
                      double discount,
                      @RequestParam
                      ProductCategory category,
                      @RequestParam
                      byte shipmentPlans)
        For post request to creates product.
        Parameters:
        accountId - account id.
        name - product name.
        weight - product weight.
        conditionUsed - product condition used. true if used, false if new.
        price - product price.
        discount - product discount.
        category - product category.
        shipmentPlans - shipment plan
        Returns:
        the product that have been made

      • getProductFiltered

        @GetMapping("/getFiltered")
public java.util.List<Product> getProductFiltered​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0")
                                                  int page,
                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="2")
                                                  int pageSize,
                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="-1")
                                                  int accountId,
                                                  @RequestParam
                                                  java.lang.String search,
                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="0.0")
                                                  double minPrice,
                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="0.0")
                                                  double maxPrice,
                                                  @RequestParam
                                                  ProductCategory category)
        For get request to get all product that have been filtered
        Parameters:
        page - page of list.
        pageSize - page size of list.
        accountId - account id.
        search - product name.
        minPrice - minimum price.
        maxPrice - maximum price.
        category - product category.
        Returns:
        all product that have been filtered with certain page and page size.
